heading: 2.0.4 Patch Hotfix â€“ November 4th
content: Season 6 and Vessel of Hatred are here for almost a month. Blizzard is always monitoring the game and after releasing the 2.0.4 patch recently, a 2.0.4 patch hotfix is now live to fix more and more bugs! We hope you are enjoying your time on the new Season 6! We hope you enjoy the Season of Hatred Rising and the Vessel of Hatred expansion with the aid of our Season 6 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 6 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes while following vrious Vessel of Hatred hotfixes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 6 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
